sentences.english: Fig 1 helps illustrate the difference between good and poor wettability.
sentences.chinese: 图1说明帮助之间的区别和穷人良好的润湿性。
同情的泪水润湿了我的双颊。

sentences.english: Water based or solvent free UV curing wetting agent.
sentences.chinese: 水性系统或无溶剂紫外线硬化系统使用之润湿剂。

sentences.english: The dew on the branches drizzled our hair and shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 润湿了我们的头发和双肩。

sentences.english: Not consist of cadmium, the melting point lower than 25B, bettered wetness and filling property.
sentences.chinese: 无镉熔点低于25B，提高了润湿性和填充性。

sentences.english: Such curvature has no effect on wettability .
sentences.chinese: 这种曲度对润湿性并无影响。

sentences.english: WC are dispersing well in liquid steel due to its interfacial reaction and wettable with li…
sentences.chinese: 刚玉与钢液不润湿，分散不好，且引起颗粒脱落。

sentences.english: Non-virgin muscle relaxation, there is a sense of wetting.
sentences.chinese: 非处女肌肉松弛，有润湿感。

sentences.english: The complete explanation of wetting hysteresis may pose quite a complex problem .
sentences.chinese: 要全面解释润湿滞合作用就会出现很复杂的问题。

sentences.english: A new passive reflective display pixel unit using phenomenon-electrowetting principle is prepared.
sentences.chinese: 利用电润湿原理制备了一种新型受光反射型显示单元。

sentences.english: Her eyes were bedewed with tears.
sentences.chinese: 她的双眼被泪水润湿了。

sentences.english: Wettability is not stable and falters.
sentences.chinese: 润湿性并不稳定和衰退。

sentences.english: At the same time, the change of the interfacial wettability was examined by the sessile drop method.
sentences.chinese: 同时利用真空座滴法对界面润湿性的变化进行了评定。

sentences.english: Ater that, she said nothing. The tears must have filled in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 之后就沉默了很久，可能眼泪已经润湿了眼眶。

definition: to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
